title: The Green Bean
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe in the heart of the downtown historic district with a few vegan dishes, including an in-house-made burger, hummus wrap, tofu scramble wrap for breakfast and vegan pastries. Other items can be made vegan upon request. Offers soy milk for drinks, smoothies, local coffee and lattes. Free Wi-Fi. Bring your reusable mug or mason jar for drinks, but if you forget they use Greenware.
